peregrine.util.netty
Class MultiChannelBufferWritable

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.util.netty.MultiChannelBufferWritable
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, ChannelBufferWritable
public class MultiChannelBufferWritable
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChannelBufferWritable

Write each value to N output streams. All of these streams are async and only block when their buffer is full. In the future investigate using scatter/gather with async IO for performance reasons.

handleFailure

public void handleFailure(ChannelBufferWritable out,
                          Host host,
                          java.lang.Throwable cause)
Determines how we handle failure of a specific OutputStream failing. The default is just to log the fact that we failed (which we should ALWAYS do) but in production we should probably gossip about the failure with the controller so that we understand what is happening.
